actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no governmental authority shall at any time force any school or school district which is desegregated: (1) to take any action to force the busing of students; (2) require the abolishment of any school so desegrated; or (3) to force, on account of race, creed, or color, the transfer of students to or from a particular school so desegregated over the protest of his or her parents.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States.
